name: Rots'n'Bots
description:
Rots'n'Bots is an online strategy game mixing real time and turn based strategy. Choose between Rots, zombie like creatures or Bots, artificially controlled robots to fight against your opponent in a 1 vs 1 match. Protect your settlement by gathering resources, building an army and controlling certain region of the maps.

Movement and combat

Unit movements and actions are regulated by an Action Points system. Use them wisely to achieve strategic attacks.

Farming

Resources are required to build an army and fight. Natural resources can be extracted but will need to be defended.

Crafting

Build your own strategy by using different types of units together. All units have strength and weaknesses.

Controlling

You will encounter control points, which are zones to control. They are essential to your economy and military power as they will grant you extra resources.

Multiplayer

Rots'n'Bots has a single player mode, allowing you to try out the game against the AI on one map. It is best played online via a LAN or via Steam.
